title: My phone is disconnected from Wi-Fi in standby mode. What should I do?
answer:
On a home screen, touch **Settings** > **WI-FI** > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45444) > **Advanced** > **Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep** > **Always**.


 ****  

 **![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45445) Note: Only when plugged in** is selected by default. The following options are available: 

 **Never(increase data usage)**: Your phone goes to sleep in 15 minutes when the display is turned off. 

 **Only when plugged in**: Your phone keeps awake when being charged. 

**Always**: Your phone never goes to sleep
